Title: Enacts the rent regulation reporting act of 2019
Summary: Requires the state commissioner of housing and community renewal to submit an annual report on the programs and activities undertaken by the office of rent administration and the tenant protection unit pertaining to rent regulation.
LawCode: Amd ยง20, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to enacting the rent regulation reporting act of 2019
